text: @ConservativeVoiceIn a world where Western dominance is waning, it's no surprise that stability is on shaky ground. The US presidential election in November won't change the fact that the global situation is a mess. Italy and Spain are worried about escalation, but we must remember that appeasement only emboldens our enemies. Trump's stance on NATO is a warning to Russia, not an invitation for aggression. Putin's threats are nothing new, but we can't let fear dictate our actions. We must stand firm in the face of adversity and defend our values.
